meta.title: NevNein
meta.description: Personal website of Adam Di Mario

HomePage.greeting: Hello, I'm Adam and this is my website.
HomePage.intro: It will probably be a constant work in progress, I'll just keep adding stuff when/if I have time. Below are some useful links.
HomePage.colophon: This website uses technical cookies to persist your language preference. The typeface used on this website is Berkeley Mono by Berkeley Graphics ©. Every other work on nevnein.it © 2024 by Adam Di Mario is licensed under <license>CC BY-NC-SA 4.0</license>.

meta.title: Adam Di Mario
meta.description: Curriculum Vitæ of Adam Di Mario

meta.title: Notes
meta.description: Collected notes about web dev stuff from Adam Di Mario

Notes.intro: Here I collect some notes about web dev stuff, mostly things that I did or discover that deserve some space. Some are long articles, some are just few lines of code. It's not really a blog, more of a collection of things I'll likely come back to, and an excuse to excercise my poor writing skills.
Notes.disclaimer: Things in web dev change constantly, some of the content here might be outdated. Feel free to shoot me an email if you find any errors.
